post:
Choose MyRootPW to become your next web hosting provider.
The Shared Web-Hosting Offers take resources on powerful servers with
SSD-Disks and are managed by the state of the art Control-Panel.

You will get 99.9% uptime guaranteed, Free LetsEncrypt SSL Certificates, 
1 Click-Wordpress Installations and more!

Choose your location between the USA, Netherlands and Austria ! Starting at only 10 Euro per Year!

**Web-Hosting Plans**

**Small**
**5 GB SSD** Storage
**100 GB monthly Traffic**
5 User Accounts
1 MySQL Database
Free SSL (Letsencrypt)
Host 1 Website
=> Order: [ **10 Euro / Year**](https://myroot.pw/hosting.php#showplans " **10 Euro / Year**")

 **Medium**
**15 GB SSD** Storage
**250 GB monthly Traffic**
10 User Accounts
3 MySQL Databases
1 Postgres Database
Free SSL (Letsencrypt)
Host 5 Websites
=> Order: [ **20 Euro / Year**](https://myroot.pw/hosting.php#showplans " **20 Euro / Year**")

**Large**
**30 GB SSD** Storage
**500 GB monthly Traffic**
25 User Accounts
5 MySQL Databases
5 Postgres Database
Free SSL (Letsencrypt)
Host 10 Websites
=> Order: [ **40 Euro / Year**](https://myroot.pw/hosting.php#showplans " **40 Euro / Year**")
 
_All prices excl. VAT if applicable._
